message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Given my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. Could you consider meeting me halfway at $10,250?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
